! Sample filter rules for testing
! uBlock Origin cosmetic rules
example.com##.ad-banner
test-site.net##.popup
subdomain.example.org##.tracker

! Adguard rules
adguard-test.com##selector
multi-domain.com,another-domain.net##.ads
css-inject.org#$#.custom-style

! Network rules
/ads.js$script,domain=network-test.com
||blocked.example.com^$script,domain=site1.com|site2.org

! Exception rules
whitelist.com#@#.allowed

! Invalid patterns (should be ignored)
*.wildcard.com##.ad
~negated.com##.ad
.onion-site.onion##.tracker
192.168.1.1##.local

! Scriptlet rules
scriptlet-site.com##+js(abort-on-property-read)
